data.title: BCRPS Forum: Odyssey of the Dragonlords (1
data.meta_description: ODYSSEY OF THE DRAGONLORDS DISCUSSION THREAD Bidderus – human barbarian (doomed one) Duane Fountain – minotaur paladin (oa...
data.text:
Garuda

Offline

Platinum Member

Posts: 625

SESSION ONE

Day One

The time: Early Autumn

The place: The Sour Vintage Inn (20miles east of Estoria)

Strangers at the inn

Why minotaurs struggle to make friends

A handsome fella, brimful with confidence

A shy blonde at the bar

A lyre-playing beast (of many talents)

The cloaked stranger (billy no-mates)

My name is Kyrah

Of oracles, prophecies, titans - oh and the small matter of a rampaging, divinely-touched beast

An evening of culture - lyre song and poetry

Time for bed

Day Two

We’re going on a boar hunt (we’re not scared)

A walk in the country

A meeting with strange bleating creatures

Slice and dice

The boar’s lair

Ineffective traps

By the gods, that’s one huge porker

The heroes’ scout takes one for the team (that’s got to sting a bit)

A fight to the death

Sacrificed - an offering to the five gods

Kyrah’s healing touch

Have an arrow – it’s made of gold

Seek out the oracle (come to think of it I haven’t heard from her in a while; I’m sure there’s nothing wrong)

Level Up.

matt486

Offline

Tenth Level

Posts: 58

Ado lads, the cliff notes on Halia's background:

- She's olive-skinned, with dark hair (not blonde!) and a bit pudgy.

- She trained to fight beasts from an early age, ostensibly to hunt but she is well aware of the darkness that lurks in some beasts, and sees it as her duty to protect people and civilisation from them.

- She was raised in a conclave until the age of 10, then left with some of her extended family for Mytros.

- She was wrongfully accused of smuggling and assault from an Elf Warlock called Layna; the unfortunate consequence of calling her a pointy-eared leaf licker.

- She spent some time performing hard labour in Mytros, then managed to escape with the aid of a Halfling Rogue called Tadd.

- During her incarceration, she suffered burns to her face which she conceals with her hood and her hair when not fighting.

- When she returned to the conclave where she grew up, she found it destroyed and abandoned, and has been searching for her friends and extended family ever since.

- Halia's name was never cleared and she is wanted in Mytros. Because of this, and because her distinct appearance makes her significantly recognisable, she must approach any need to visit the city with exceptional care.

Also if anyone's interested I've taken Cure Wounds as one of my Ranger spells, so that might mitigate our lack of healers somewhat!

Candi

Offline

Tenth Level

Posts: 69

Meet - Roht Morningstar!

Age - ??

Class - Warlock

Race - Aasimir

Apperance - Golden Blonde hair that defies gravity with an anime style, He has a slight aura you wouldnt notice unless light hits him a certain way. Well Dressed and good looking but for somereason his charms arnt working on the ladies... "Ohhh my i but ive seen this work for other humans... I mean for other gentlemen."

Short Back Story - Tasked too retrive a lightning bolt destroying the hill tops and killing many villagers or wannabe heros, Roht was tricked too leave his position and retrieve the Bolt which has burnt his wings preventing him from ascending back too his position, Left unable too return home and lightning bolt in hand he heard the Inhuman whispers in his head "Stormheald".
